dashboard.description:
# Early Adopters: Adoption
**Pre-deployment use of communication tools & Post-deployment use of Teams** * Survey your Early Adopters employees before the deployment to define a baseline usage of the current collaboration tools. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to assess an increase of usage. The two metrics used are *Times per week* and *Hours per week*.
**Breakdown of usage** * See the distribution of the usage, before and after the deployment of Teams, for both metrics described above.
dashboard.name: Early Adopters: Adoption

metric.label: Teams - pre-deployment adoption times distribution - Early Adopters
Teams - pre-deployment adoption hours distribution - Early Adopters
Teams - post-deployment adoption times distribution - Early Adopters
Teams - post-deployment adoption hours distribution - Early Adopters

dashboard.description:
# Early Adopters: Collaboration
**Pre-deployment & Post-deployment collaboration** * Run a survey before and after the deployment to define your Early Adopters collaboration score. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to observe an increase in the collaboration score.
**Breakdown of usage** * See the distribution of the usage, before and after the deployment of Teams, for both metrics described above.
dashboard.name: Early Adopters: Collaboration

metric.label: Teams - pre-deployment collaboration methods distribution - Early Adopters
Teams - pre-deployment collaboration team location distribution - Early Adopters

kpiConfig.title: Post-deployment collaboration with colleagues using Teams

metric.label: Teams - post-deployment collaboration methods distribution - Early Adopters

dashboard.description:
# MS Teams: Employee engagement This pack helps measure your employee satisfaction, adoption and collaboration on Microsoft Teams. Track what your employees like and dislike, ask them how many times per week and how much time they spend on collaboration tools, and if in the end they preferred the old way compared to the new.
Four dashboards focus on the Early Adopters and four dashboards target Production.
# Early Adopters: Overview
**User satisfaction score** * Survey your Early Adopters employees before the deployment to define a baseline satisfaction of the current collaboration tools. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to assess an improvement or a deterioration of the overall satisfaction.
**User adoption (number of hours / week)** * Get to know how many hours per week your Early Adopters employees use collaboration tools. Ideally you should observe an increase once Microsoft Team is in place.
**User adoption (number of times / week)** * As for the number of hours, once Microsoft Team is in place you should observe an increase in the number of times your Early Adopters report usage of Teams vs. your old collaboration tools.
**User collaboration score** * Assess your Early Adopters collaboration score. As for the satisfaction score, they should feel that collaboration is easier once Microsoft Teams is in place compared to their old collaboration tools.
**Users preference** * Read what percentage of your Early Adopters prefer Teams compared to the old collaboration tool. Investigate on the users not preferring Teams.
**Call quality satisfaction - last 30 days** * Continuously monitor the satisfaction of your employees on their last audio or video call made with Microsoft Teams.
::: configuration In order to take full advantage of this content pack, categories and metrics need to be adjusted.
**Please contact Nexthink Professional services if needed.** :::
dashboard.name: Early Adopters: Overview

metric.label: Teams - Call quality satisfaction last 30 days - Early Adopters

dashboard.description:
# Early Adopters: Satisfaction
**Pre-deployment & Post-deployment satisfaction on communication tools** * Survey your Early Adopters employees before the deployment to define a baseline satisfaction of the current collaboration tools. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to assess an improvement or a deterioration of the overall satisfaction.
**Satisfaction breakdown** * See the distribution of the satisfaction.
**What users like the most** * Compare the positive points before and after the deployment of Microsoft Teams.
**What users dislike the most** * Compare the negative points before and after the deployment of Microsoft Teams.
dashboard.name: Early Adopters: Satisfaction

metric.label: Teams - pre-deployment satisfaction respondents - Early Adopters
Teams - pre-deployment satisfaction positive points - Early Adopters
Teams - pre-deployment satisfaction negative points - Early Adopters

Teams - post-deployment satisfaction positive points - Early Adopters
Teams - post-deployment satisfaction negative points - Early Adopters

# Production: Adoption
**Pre-deployment use of communication tools & Post-deployment use of Teams** * Survey your Production employees before the deployment to define a baseline usage of the current collaboration tools. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to assess an increase of usage. The two metrics used are *Times per week* and *Hours per week*.
**Breakdown of usage** * See the distribution of the usage, before and after the deployment of Teams, for both metrics described above.

**Pre-deployment & Post-deployment collaboration** * Run a survey before and after the deployment to define your Production employees collaboration score. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to observe an increase in the collaboration score.
**Breakdown of usage** * See the distribution of the usage, before and after the deployment of Teams, for both metrics described above.

dashboard.description:
# Production: Overview
**User satisfaction score** * Survey your Production employees before the deployment to define a baseline satisfaction of the current collaboration tools. Run the same survey after Teams is installed to assess an improvement or a deterioration of the overall satisfaction.
**User adoption (number of hours / week)** * Get to know how many hours per week your Production employees use collaboration tools. Ideally you should observe an increase once Microsoft Team is in place.
**User adoption (number of times / week)** * As for the number of hours, once Microsoft Team is in place you should observe an increase in the number of times your Production employees report usage of Teams vs. your old collaboration tools.
**User collaboration score** * Assess your Production employees collaboration score. As for the satisfaction score, they should feel that collaboration is easier once Microsoft Teams is in place compared to their old collaboration tools.
**Users preference** * Read what percentage of your Production employees prefer Teams compared to the old collaboration tool. Investigate on the users not preferring Teams.
**Call quality satisfaction - last 30 days** * Continuously monitor the satisfaction of your employees on their last audio or video call made with Microsoft Teams.
